name: complete-node-bootcamp
description: I just learn how to use express... ..

scripts.pm2: pm2 stop 4-natours/starter/server.js && NODE_ENV=development pm2 start 4-natours/starter/server.js --update-env --watch --ignore-watch 4-natours/starter/public/img && pm2 log
scripts.pm2:prod: pm2 stop 4-natours/starter/server.js && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start 4-natours/starter/server.js --update-env --watch && pm2 log
